banner.title: Business Support Services
banner.description: We provide comprehensive business registration and compliance solutions for entrepreneurs, startups, and established companies. Our expert team ensures a smooth setup process and timely compliance so you can focus on scaling your business without legal or regulatory roadblocks.

offerings.title: Our Key Offerings
offerings.subtitle: 1. Company Registration
offerings.description: We assist in incorporating different types of companies tailored to your business model:

items.title: Private Limited Company –
items.description: Ideal for startups and SMEs seeking investor funding and limited liability.

items.title: Public Limited Company –
items.description: Best suited for large-scale operations and public shareholding.

items.title: Section 8 Company –
items.description: Specially designed for non-profit organizations focusing on charity, education, and social welfare.

items.title: Dormant Company –
items.description: For companies that are inactive but wish to maintain corporate status.

items.title: One Person Company (OPC) –
items.description: Perfect for solo entrepreneurs seeking limited liability and full control.

items.title: New LLP Formation –
items.description: Combining the operational flexibility of a partnership with the benefits of limited liability.

items.title: Conversion to LLP –
items.description: Seamless transformation of an existing Company or Partnership Firm into an LLP to reduce compliance burden and increase operational ease.

items.title: Company/LLP Registration for Foreign Individuals –
items.description: Ensuring compliance with FEMA and RBI guidelines for foreign entrepreneurs.

items.title: Incorporation of Subsidiaries –
items.description: Setting up wholly-owned subsidiaries in India with full legal and regulatory assistance.

items.title: Annual Filings –
items.description: Preparation and submission of annual returns, financial statements, and other statutory forms to the Registrar of Companies.

items.title: Event-Based Filings –
items.description: Handling changes like director appointments, share transfers, capital alterations, and address changes in compliance with ROC regulations.

items.title: Formation & Registration –
items.description: Helping you set up charitable organizations in accordance with Indian laws.

items.title: Documentation & Compliance –
items.description: Drafting trust deeds, society bylaws, and ensuring adherence to ongoing compliance requirements
